page.title: 20CHILDRENS MORNING-CANON PYON
page.content: Betty gets up,puts on'a morning coat', and has cornflakes for{breakfast.}She dresses in a skirt and top and uses Crest toothpaste.She brushes her hair with a bristle brush.As it Monday Dad gives her 30p swimming money.She says goodbye to Mum and Dad then goes to Gran's to say goodbye to her and her boys.She waits for the school bus.On Thursday Karl wakes at 8:00 and has Weetabix with milk and sugar.He washes and brushes his teeth.He puts his lunch in his box and sets off on his bike which has 5 gears.In school it's Assembly then using computers and Ginn maths.For{lunch}he has sandwiches,egg (boiled),fruit,crisps,a biscuit and a bottle of milk.On Saturday June gets up at 8:00.Washes with flannel and soap and puts trousers and jumper on. Mum gives her Sugar Puffs,bacon,egg & tea.Then gardens and rides her bike.
